=LINUX/GENERIC Installation Instructions=
==Requires java/jre 5 or better==

Download [http://carsonday.googlepages.com/DecafGeneric.tar.gz DecafGeneric.tar.gz]

Unzip/tar it in a new directory.

Download speech pack if you want Speech enabled [http://carsonday.googlepages.com/DecafSpeech.tar.gz DecafSpeech.tar.gz] and copy it to to the new directory created above.

gunzip and untar in the new directory created above.

If you have an athlon processor edit properties/timeseal.properties and uncomment the athlon line and comment out the x86 line.

To run with speech double click on DecafSpeech.jar, to run without click on Decaf.jar.
